mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ppshopgoodinfo, ppshopgoodinfonobase WHERE ppshopgoodinfo.userPhone = ppshopgoodinfonobase.PuserPhone AND ppshopgoodinfonobase.PuserPhone = #{ PuserPhone }
SELECT * FROM ppshopgoodinfo, ppshopgoodinfonobase GROUP BY userPhone
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ppshopgoodinfonobase WHERE ppshopgoodinfonobase.PuserPhone = #{ PuserPhone }
